001001-aBook.shortText: The Statue of Liberty's original torch is getting a new home
001001-aBook.author: Margaret Mitchell

001002-bBook.shortText: Getting excited to eat your mother's roast turkey, your uncle's stuffing and your sister's famous green bean casserole?
001002-bBook.author: Jane Austen

002001-cBook.shortText: Amid the farm houses and barns dotting the Mad River Valley area of rural Vermont, five miles north of Sugarbush ski resort, Marisa Mauro is making butter.
002001-cBook.author: Rachel Carson
